subTitle: Displays remaining time for a SLA
name: slaCountDownClock
title: SLA Count Down Timer

metadata.description:
SLA Count Down Timer

  • Sets a count down timer which displays time remaining for SLA breach
  • Allows to display time remaining or consumed after SLA is acheived , based on setting
  • Requires Following
    • SLA Due Date
    • SLA Complete Date
    • Condition to stop timer
